title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5908.6 - Approval or disapproval of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5908.6 - Approval or disapproval of application

State Regulations
(a) An application, when reviewed and
accepted by the foundation staff, shall be considered by the technology and
disabilities program committee, which may either reject the application or
recommend the approval of the application and transmittal thereof to the board. In either case, the T&D program manager shall promptly notify the applicant
of the technology and disabilities program committee action after it has
completed its review. (b) An
application shall not be deemed to have final approval until it is approved by
the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5908.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
